mean_cn: n. 小提琴，无意识而不停地拨弄；  v. 虚度时光，拉小提琴，拉小提琴，瞎搞
mean_en: this instrument has four strings and a hollow body and an unfretted fingerboard and is played with a bow
short_phrase: The little boy plays the fiddle.
sentence: Where did you learn to play the fiddle like that, young man?
sentence_trans: 年轻人，你是从哪儿学的那样拉小提琴？
